byline.contributor: Alexandra Odynova and Nikolay Khalip contributed reporting.
byline.original: By NEIL MacFARQUHAR and ANDREW E. KRAMER

abstract: Thousands attend Moscow wake and funeral of slain Russian opposition leader Boris Y Nemtsov, including diplomats and political allies but none of Kremlin elite; politicians speak in eulogies about need to continue his quest against corruption, mismanagement and Ukraine war.
lead_paragraph: Diplomats, political allies and family members said their last goodbyes at the wake and funeral of Boris Y. Nemtsov, who was fatally shot in Moscow.

headline.main: Memorial for Nemtsov, Assassinated Critic of Putin, Draws Thousands
headline.print_headline: Memorial for Assassinated Critic of Putin Draws Thousands

snippet: Diplomats, political allies and family members said their last goodbyes at the wake and funeral of Boris Y. Nemtsov, who was fatally shot in Moscow.
